AssetShare.name: AssetShare
AssetShare.description: Represents a sharing entry on an Asset.

AssetAccessLevel.description: Level of access that the User or Group has to the Asset. The possible values are: Read Edit All This value is not valid for creating or deleting records. This field must be set to an access level that is higher than the organization’s default access level for cases.

AssetId.description: ID of the Asset associated with this sharing entry. This field can't be updated.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

RowCause.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual. If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual. All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

UserOrGroupId.description: ID of the User or Group that has been given access to the Asset. This field can't be updated.

AssetShare.accessRules: Customer Portal users can’t access this object.
